Tony Dungy said. Hear the entire interview in this CBS Philly SportsPod... Tony Dungy says he truly marveled over some of the things Michael Vick was able to do this season for the Eagles. He was calm in the pocket, he was hitting second, third, fourth receivers, throwing the ball well and just being in command of things. And then still with that ability to escape and get away from the rush and make plays out of nothing, Tony Dungy told KYW Newsradio. , Tracy McGrady Allen Iverson is set to retire from the NBA, according to an online report. Commentator Stephen A. Smith published a statement on his Web site Wednesday attributed to Allen Iverson . It said Allen Iverson plans to retire but also that I feel strongly that I can still compete at the highest level. The statement also said Allen Iverson has tremendous love for the game and the desire to play. " Michael Jordan legacy would be huge," Cleveland Cavaliers All-Star LeBron James said. Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness.
